sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import '../styles/PurchaseRequest.css'; const ViewForm = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [form, setForm] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetchForm(); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); const fetchForm = async () => { try { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); const response = await axios.get(`http://192.168.17.15:5000/api/forms/${id}`, { headers: { 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` } }); if (response.data) { console.log("API Response:", response.data); // แปลง details เป็น object ถ้าเป็น string if (typeof response.data.details === 'string') { try { response.data.details = JSON.parse(response.data.details); } catch (err) { console.error("Error parsing details:", err); response.data.details = {}; } } setForm(response.data); } else { alert("ไม่พบข้อมูลฟอร์ม"); } } catch (error) { console.error("❌ Error fetching form:", error); alert("เกิดข้อผิดพลาดในการดึงข้อมูล"); } }; const handleDownloadPDF = () => { const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); window.open(`http://192.168.17.15:5000/api/forms/${id}/pdf?token=${token}`, '_blank'); }; if (!form) return

🔄 กำลังโหลดข้อมูล...

; // ใช้ข้อมูลจาก form.details const detailsObj = form.details || {}; console.log("Form Details:", detailsObj); const { name, department, date, deliveryDate, items = [], vendorName, vendorAddress1, vendorAddress2, vendorZip, CountryZip, currency, terms, supervisorEmail, reasonType, reasonComments, depManagerComment, gmComment, signRequester, dateRequester, signDepartmentManager, dateDepartmentManager, signGeneralManager, dateGeneralManager, subTotal, vat, grandTotal } = detailsObj; const isTHB = currency === 'THB'; const vatLabel = isTHB ? 'VAT (7%)' : 'VAT (0%)'; const subTotalStr = (subTotal || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); const vatStr = (vat || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); const grandTotalStr = (grandTotal || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 }); return (

Newly Weds Foods (Thailand) Limited

General Purchase Requisition

FORM # PC-FM-013

{/* Row 1: Name, Dept, Date */}
{name} {department}
{/* Row 2: Email, Date */}
{supervisorEmail}
{date}
{/* ตาราง Items */} {items.map((row, index) => ( ))}
ITEM Description UOM Quantity Cost Amount
{index + 1} {row.description} {row.unit} {row.quantity} {row.cost} {parseFloat(row.amount || 0).toLocaleString('en-US', { minimumFractionDigits: 2 })}
{/* Remarks Section */}

Remarks / หมายเหตุ :

โปรดระบุประเภทของสินค้าที่ต้องการว่าเป็นสินทรัพย์หรือเพื่อซ่อมแซม / Please specify type of goods as asset or repair-maintenance.
สินทรัพย์ = อายุใช้งาน ≥ 1 ปี และมูลค่า ≥ 1,000.- บาท / Asset = Useful life ≥ 1 year, value ≥ 1,000.- Baht
{/* Reason Section */}

Reason of Request / เหตุผลการขอราคา - ขอสั่งซื้อ

{reasonType} {deliveryDate}
{reasonComments}
{/* Vendor Info + Summary */}

Vendor Info

{vendorName}
{vendorAddress1}
{vendorAddress2}
{vendorZip}
{CountryZip}
{currency} {terms}

Sub Total: {subTotalStr} {currency}

{vatLabel}: {vatStr} {currency}

Grand Total: {grandTotalStr} {currency}

{/* Comment Section */}

Comment by Department Manager

{depManagerComment}

Comment by General Manager

{gmComment}
{/* Sign Table */}
Requester Department Manager General Manager
{signRequester}
{dateRequester}
{signDepartmentManager}
{dateDepartmentManager}
{signGeneralManager}
{dateGeneralManager}
); }; export default ViewForm;
